com.newmainsoftech.spray.slingong.datastore
Class Slim3AnnotationTransactionAspect

java.lang.Object
  com.newmainsoftech.spray.slingong.datastore.Slim3AnnotationTransactionAspect

public class Slim3AnnotationTransactionAspect
extends Object

Aspect to handle incident of call to not-read-only method of GlobalTransaction class during read-only transaction.

Author:
Arata Y.

Constant Field Values
Constructor Detail

Slim3AnnotationTransactionAspect

public Slim3AnnotationTransactionAspect()
Method Detail

isToTerminate

public static boolean isToTerminate()
Returns:
boolean value to be used to control whether throwing IllegalStateException exception when encountered call to not-read-only method of GlobalTransaction class during read-only transaction.

setToTerminate

public static void setToTerminate(boolean isToTerminate)
Set switch to throw IllegalStateException exception when encountered call to not-read-only method of GlobalTransaction class during read-only transaction.
If it's set to false, then only logging of such incident of call to not-read-only method of GlobalTransaction class during read-only transaction will be happen. Default setting is true.

Parameters:
isToTerminate - To set value to control whether throwing IllegalStateException exception.

handleInproperPersistenceIncident

protected void handleInproperPersistenceIncident(boolean isToTerminate,
                                                 org.aspectj.lang.JoinPoint joinPoint,
                                                 org.aspectj.lang.JoinPoint.EnclosingStaticPart enclosingStaticPart)
Handles incident of call to not-read-only method of GlobalTransaction class during read-only transaction.

Parameters:
isToTerminate - When true, IllegalStateException will be thrown. When false, only perform logging such incident.
joinPoint -
enclosingStaticPart -

pointcutAtCallToNotReadOnlyMethodsOfGlobalTransaction

protected static void pointcutAtCallToNotReadOnlyMethodsOfGlobalTransaction()
AspectJ's pointcut at call to not-read-only methods of GlobalTransaction from other than GlobalTransaction or Slim3PlatformTransactionManager lineage type objects.
Those not-read-only methods of GlobalTransaction are:
  • GlobalTransaction.commit()
  • overloaded delete methods
  • overloaded put methods
  • GlobalTransaction.rollback()

pointcutAtExecutionOfPublicMethodOfTransactionalType

protected static void pointcutAtExecutionOfPublicMethodOfTransactionalType()
AspectJ's pointcut at execution of public method in class what is annotated with @Transactional.

pointcutAtExecutionOfPublicMethodOfTransactionalReadOnlyType

public static boolean pointcutAtExecutionOfPublicMethodOfTransactionalReadOnlyType(org.springframework.transaction.annotation.Transactional atTx)
AspectJ's pointcut to check whether executing public method in class of what @Transactional annotation is specified as read-only.

Parameters:
atTx -
Returns:
readOnly attribute value of @Transactional annotation

pointcutForInproperPersistenceInTransactionalReadOnlyType

protected static void pointcutForInproperPersistenceInTransactionalReadOnlyType(org.springframework.transaction.annotation.Transactional atTx)
AspectJ's pointcut to pick up call to not-read-only method of GlobalTransaction class during execution of public method in class of what @Transactional annotation is specified as read-only.
This excludes join-point within Slim3PlatformTransactionManager lineage class and classes in org.slim3 package.

Parameters:
atTx -

beforeInproperPersistenceInTransactionalReadOnlyType

public void beforeInproperPersistenceInTransactionalReadOnlyType(org.aspectj.lang.JoinPoint joinPoint,
                                                                 org.aspectj.lang.JoinPoint.EnclosingStaticPart enclosingStaticPart,
                                                                 org.springframework.transaction.annotation.Transactional atTx)
AspectJ's Before advise method to handle incident of call to not-read-only method of GlobalTransaction class during execution of public method in class of what @Transactional annotation is specified as read-only.
Uses pointcutForInproperPersistenceInTransactionalReadOnlyType(Transactional) pointcut to pick up join-point.
This let handleInproperPersistenceIncident(boolean, JoinPoint, org.aspectj.lang.JoinPoint.EnclosingStaticPart) method do actual handling.

Parameters:
joinPoint -
enclosingStaticPart -
atTx -

pointcutAtExecutionOfReadOnlyTransactionalMethod

public static boolean pointcutAtExecutionOfReadOnlyTransactionalMethod(org.springframework.transaction.annotation.Transactional atTx)
AspectJ's pointcut at execution of method annotated with @Transactional annotation what has read-only attribute specified.
This excludes join-points picked up by pointcutAtExecutionOfPublicMethodOfTransactionalReadOnlyType(Transactional) pointcut.

Parameters:
atTx -
Returns:
true when atTx input is for read-only transaction.

pointcutForInproperPersistenceInReadOnlyTransactionalMethod

protected static void pointcutForInproperPersistenceInReadOnlyTransactionalMethod(org.springframework.transaction.annotation.Transactional atTx)
AspectJ's pointcut to pick up call to not-read-only method of GlobalTransaction class during execution of method annotated with @Transactional annotation what has read-only attribute specified.
This excludes join-point picked up by pointcutForInproperPersistenceInTransactionalReadOnlyType(Transactional) pointcut, and join-point within Slim3PlatformTransactionManager lineage class and classes in org.slim3 package

Parameters:
atTx -

beforeInproperPersistenceInReadOnlyTransactionalMethod

public void beforeInproperPersistenceInReadOnlyTransactionalMethod(org.aspectj.lang.JoinPoint joinPoint,
                                                                   org.aspectj.lang.JoinPoint.EnclosingStaticPart enclosingStaticPart,
                                                                   org.springframework.transaction.annotation.Transactional atTx)
AspectJ's Before advise method to handle incident of call to not-read-only method of GlobalTransaction class during execution of method annotated with @Transactional annotation what has read-only attribute specified.
Uses pointcutForInproperPersistenceInReadOnlyTransactionalMethod(Transactional) pointcut to pick up join-point.
This let handleInproperPersistenceIncident(boolean, JoinPoint, org.aspectj.lang.JoinPoint.EnclosingStaticPart) method do actual handling.

Parameters:
joinPoint -
enclosingStaticPart -
atTx -
